info.title: Hotel Management System (PMS) API
info.description: REST API for Hotel Property Management System. This API provides endpoints for managing guests, rooms, reservations, check-in/check-out processes, and invoice generation.

tags.name: Rate Type Management
tags.description: APIs for managing rate types and room type rates

tags.name: Invoice Management
tags.description: APIs for managing invoices and billing

tags.name: Reservation Management
tags.description: APIs for managing hotel reservations, check-in, and check-out

tags.name: Room Type Management
tags.description: APIs for managing hotel room types

get.description: Retrieves a room by its unique identifier

400.description: Invalid input data

delete.description: Deletes a room from the system

get.description: Retrieves a room type by its unique identifier

put.description: Updates an existing room type's information

400.description: Invalid input data or room type name already exists

delete.description: Deletes a room type from the system. Cannot delete if rooms are using this type.

400.description: Cannot delete room type as it is in use by rooms

get.description: Retrieves a reservation by its unique identifier

put.description: Updates an existing reservation. Allows changing room, dates, guest, rate type, and other details. Cannot update checked-out reservations.

400.description: Invalid input data, room not available, or cannot update checked-out reservation

get.description: Retrieves the rate for a specific room type in a rate type

put.description: Updates the rate for a specific room type in a rate type

400.description: Invalid rate value

delete.description: Removes a rate for a specific room type from a rate type

get.description: Retrieves a rate type with all its room type rates

put.description: Updates an existing rate type's basic information

400.description: Invalid input data or rate type name already exists

delete.description: Deletes a rate type from the system. Cannot delete if reservations are using this rate type.

400.description: Cannot delete rate type as it is in use by reservations

get.description: Retrieves a guest by their unique identifier

400.description: Invalid input data

delete.description: Deletes a guest from the system

get.description: Retrieves a list of all rooms in the system

post.description: Creates a new room record in the system

400.description: Invalid input data

get.description: Retrieves a list of all room types in the system

200.description: List of room types retrieved successfully

post.description: Creates a new room type definition in the system

400.description: Invalid input data or room type name already exists

get.description: Retrieves a list of all reservations in the system

post.description: Creates a new reservation for a guest

400.description: Invalid input data or room not available
Reservation must be checked in before checkout
Invalid reservation status for check-in
Cannot cancel a checked-out reservation

get.description: Retrieves a list of all rate types in the system

200.description: List of rate types retrieved successfully

post.description: Creates a new rate type with room type rates

400.description: Invalid input data or rate type name already exists

post.description: Adds a rate for a specific room type to a rate type

404.description: Rate type or room type not found

400.description: Rate already exists for this room type

post.description: Marks an invoice as paid and records payment method

400.description: Invoice is already paid

post.description: Adds a new item to an existing invoice

400.description: Cannot add items to a paid invoice

post.description: Generates an invoice for a reservation

400.description: Invoice already exists for this reservation

get.description: Retrieves a list of all guests in the system

post.description: Creates a new guest record in the system

400.description: Invalid input data

get.description: Retrieves all rooms of a specific room type
Retrieves a room by its room number
Retrieves a list of available rooms for today (defaults to today and tomorrow). Room availability is determined by date range and reservation conflicts, not just room status.

200.description: List of available rooms retrieved successfully

get.summary: Get available rooms for date range
get.description: Retrieves a list of available rooms for a specific date range. Room availability is determined by checking room status (must be READY) and reservation conflicts for the given date range.

200.description: List of available rooms retrieved successfully

400.description: Invalid date range

get.description: Retrieves a room type by its name
Retrieves all reservations with a specific status
Retrieves a reservation by its reservation number
Retrieves all reservations for a specific guest
Retrieves all reservations within a date range
Retrieves a rate type by its name
Retrieves a list of all invoices in the system
Retrieves an invoice by its unique identifier
Retrieves all invoices with a specific status
Retrieves all invoices for a specific reservation
Retrieves an invoice by its invoice number
Retrieves a guest by their email address
